title: Behavioral Health Integration
prompt: An overhead shot of a weathered kitchen table in soft morning light, scattered with handwritten notes, a cup of coffee, and a notepad, hands of two people in conversation across the table—one wearing a cardigan, one in work clothes—with a window showing rural farmland in soft focus behind them, captured in warm amber tones with visible dust particles in the light, conveying quiet dignity and the informal spaces where rural healthcare conversations actually happen.
